attributes.contentHtml: SpoonyTG I felt like Skateboardings would attack me if i did. Anyways I recognize, I have been manipulated countless times throughout the process of this server. By Schaefer, Crent, and possibly you. And do to this stress and not having a world of time, I shut down this server. I am only planning on reviving it if I have a really, really, trustable partner. Smooth is a thing of the past, you may close this thread. Skateboardings will not continue to assist me in this journey in the future. I would also like to say you wernt "always" owner, you were given it for 5 minutes. Smooth is gone so theres no purpose in continuing.

attributes.title: Owner Of Galactic Nodes + Smooth Network Scammers, Raiders, 13 Year Old Owners.

attributes.contentHtml: Endy 5 minutes was recently, if your gonna whitelist your servers make them local host/for friends only and keep it private forever.
